changePassword.restriction_no_account_name: Not contain the user or company's account name
changePassword.restriction_not_more_than_two_identical: Not contain more than 2 identical characters in a row
changePassword.restriction_one_lower_case: Have at least one lowercase letter
changePassword.restriction_one_capital_case: Have at least one capital letter
changePassword.restriction_password_expired: Opps )-: Your password has expired and must be changed

sendCode.title: Get an access code
sendCode.subtitle: In order to reset your password, please provide your mobile number or user name to get an access code

insertCode.title: Insert code
insertCode.subtitle: Please submit the access code you've received in order to reset your password

errorPopup.title: Sorry, but something went wrong
errorPopup.content: Something went wrong. Please try again or contact Customer Care for help.
